p: Calculated evapotranspiration (ET) for the four treatments ranged from 576 to 643 mm in 2012 and from 619 to 673 mm in 2013. Water use efficiency (WUE) of the SS-LS treatment averaged 2.93 kg m −3 in both years ( Table 3), which was 21–35% and 13–20% higher than WUE for the other treatments in 2012 and 2013, respectively.
